arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Hamburger SV – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and Hamburger SV face off in a Bundesliga clash on Saturday at the Allianz Arena. The reigning champions will look to maintain their perfect start to the season, while newly-promoted Hamburger seek their first victory since returning to the top flight.
